title: os x client: time machine local snapshots cause ignored files
body:
system os x 10.8.4
owncloud client 1.3.0

with time machine enabled, a local snapshot is created for use.  hard links are created in /.mobilebackups/ under the computer, date, user.  this causes modified files to be ignored.  this behavior cannot be changed, and time machine should not be disabled by responsible users.

1 file in question:
adams-macbook-pro:financial peace university along$ ls -lai buyer\ beware.m4v 
3429958 -rw-r--r--  2 along  staff  638482169 aug  3 21:39 buyer beware.m4v

find all hard links
adams-macbook-pro:~ along$ sudo find / -xdev -inum 3429958
/.mobilebackups/computer/2013-08-03-083404/volume/users/along/music/itunes/itunes media/tv shows/financial peace university/buyer beware.m4v
/users/along/music/itunes/itunes media/tv shows/financial peace university/buyer beware.m4v

owncloud log
08-05 13:19:07:707 csync_ftw: uniq id from database: itunes media/tv shows/financial peace university/buyer beware.m4v -> <null>
08-05 13:19:07:707 csync_walker: file: /users/along/music/itunes/itunes media/tv shows/financial peace university/buyer beware.m4v
08-05 13:19:07:707 _csync_detect_update: ==> file: itunes media/tv shows/financial peace university/buyer beware.m4v - hash 14637627793032998352, mtime: 1375580347
08-05 13:19:07:708 _csync_detect_update: file: itunes media/tv shows/financial peace university/buyer beware.m4v, instruction: instruction_ignore <<=
